title: Create a Trial Exhibit List
description: In preparation for trial, a paralegal needs to create a list of all exhibits the party intends to use.

tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has a collection of all documents and physical evidence.

tasks.description: Create a list with columns for Exhibit Number, a brief description, and whether it has been admitted into evidence.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a structured exhibit list.

tasks.description: Populate the list with all the potential exhibits.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a complete list to be exchanged with the court and opposing counsel.
